name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Data Exfiltration Incident
description: This playbook responds to an incident where a PowerShell script was used to extract sensitive data from a server.

parallel--0e3c67f0-a334-46e3-9a51-a65b39.name: Immediate Response Actions
parallel--0e3c67f0-a334-46e3-9a51-a65b39.description: Terminate processes and disable scheduled tasks to mitigate the attack

action--c30e6e9e-19e2-465b-9277-505425c4.name: Terminate the suspicious PowerShell process
action--c30e6e9e-19e2-465b-9277-505425c4.description: Stop any ongoing PowerShell processes that might be exfiltrating data.

action--3d3fda5a-b934-4f37-b07a-b52673ee.name: Disable scheduled tasks related to PowerShell scripts
action--3d3fda5a-b934-4f37-b07a-b52673ee.description: Remove any scheduled tasks that initiate PowerShell scripts to prevent further execution.

commands.command: for task in $(schtasks /query /fo csv | grep PowerShell | cut -d, -f1 | tr -d '"'); do schtasks /delete /tn "$task" /f; done

action--7e65b1d0-b413-4b2d-bdeb-b3da1935.name: Run incident response tool
action--7e65b1d0-b413-4b2d-bdeb-b3da1935.description: Initiate a scan for indicators of compromise on the affected host.

while-condition--63997865-46aa-4497-bc3f.name: Scan Result Evaluation
while-condition--63997865-46aa-4497-bc3f.description: Check if the scan indicates any threats.

action--a8c186c9-cfcb-40af-b6e8-4e7766a7.name: Conclude Incident Response
action--a8c186c9-cfcb-40af-b6e8-4e7766a7.description: Wrap up the incident response activities.
